Class EmailUtil

java.lang.Object
de.lases.business.util.EmailUtil
public class EmailUtil extends Object
Provides functionality for sending emails.

  • Method Details

    • sendEmail

      public static void sendEmail​(String sender, String[] recipients, String[] cc, String subject, String body) throws EmailTransmissionFailedException
      Sends an email to a given recipient.
      Parameters:
      sender - The senders email address.
      recipients - The recipients email addresses.
      cc - The recipients in carbon-copy.
      subject - The subject of the email.
      body - The body of the email.
      Throws:
      EmailTransmissionFailedException - Thrown when an issue with the transmission of the email has occurred.

    • generateMailToLink

      public static String generateMailToLink​(String[] recipients, String[] cc, String subject, String body)
      Generates a mailto link.
      Parameters:
      recipients - The recipients email addresses.
      cc - The recipients in carbon-copy.
      subject - The subject of the email.
      body - The body of the email.
      Returns:
      A link leading to a mailto e-mail.

    • isEmailUsed

      public static boolean isEmailUsed​(String address)
      Determines whether an e-mail address has already been registered in the application.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the email is already in use, false otherwise.
